prompt: Wide horizontal logo layout. On the LEFT side: a minimalist flat icon of a 3D print nozzle (medium blue, approx #2D8ACF) extruding material onto three horizontal wavy layered lines (dark charcoal #2D3A4A), representing additive manufacturing layers. The nozzle has a small rounded rectangle on top, trapezoid body tapering to a point, with a small curved filament line connecting to the wavy layers below. On the RIGHT side of the icon: bold sans-serif text 'Additive Manufacturing' in dark charcoal, with 'Guide' directly below it in smaller font and blue color (#2D8ACF). Clean white background, flat design, no gradients, no shadows. Professional and minimal. Suitable for website header.
